00049 #define TMP_T_TEMPL_IMPL_DIM(N,D) \
00050 bool N::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<D,D>& T, double& r, MsqError& ) \
00051   { return eval( T, r ); } \
00052 bool N::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<D,D>& T, double& r, MsqMatrix<D,D>& d1, MsqError& ) \
00053   { return grad( T, r, d1 ); } \
00054 bool N::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<D,D>& T, double& r, MsqMatrix<D,D>& d1, MsqMatrix<D,D>* d2, MsqError& ) \
00055   { return hess( T, r, d1, d2 ); }

00131 template <unsigned D> struct DimConst {};
00132 template <> struct DimConst<2> {
00133   static inline double sqrt() { return MSQ_SQRT_TWO; }
00134   static inline double inv()  { return 0.5; }
00135 };
00136 template <> struct DimConst<3> {
00137   static inline double sqrt() { return MSQ_SQRT_THREE; }
00138   static inline double inv()  { return MSQ_ONE_THIRD; }
00139 };
